links.title: Company Updates - New Product Launch
links.content:
# Pioneering Multi Club Ownership as a NASDAQ listed company

Pioneering Multi Club Ownership as a NASDAQ listed company. Our mission is to continue building shareholder value while delivering social impact programs through our teams to their communities.

### Brera News

[View All Press Releases](/press-releases)

### Our clubs

![Brera Milana Logo](https://storage.googleapis.com/vendorgroup-assets/site/246abe1c-dd4c-49cb-a2ed-056c6b3bf6e2/milano-logo.png/2023/09/12/6500cfde9a8576153b54fcd0)

Brera Football Club was founded in 2000 by the young publisher and journalist Alessandro Aleotti. The first manager appointed was former Inter and Sampdoria goalkeeper Walter Zenga. The team played its matches in the newly reopened Arena Civica, but was relegated from Serie D. 

[![Strumica Logo](https://storage.googleapis.com/vendorgroup-assets/site/246abe1c-dd4c-49cb-a2ed-056c6b3bf6e2/strumica-logo.png/2023/09/12/6500cfc3c652d16c3d9a4b60)](/teams/brera-strumica)

On February 15, 2023 the Company announced its first planned acquisition with the signing of a Letter of Intent to acquire the European first division football team Fudbalski Klub Akademija Pandev (“Akademija Pandev”) in North Macedonia, a country which has the right to participate in the three major UEFA competitions. 

[![Tchumene logo](https://storage.googleapis.com/vendorgroup-assets/site/246abe1c-dd4c-49cb-a2ed-056c6b3bf6e2/tchumene-logo.png/2023/09/12/6500cfaa6c778107cf214e36)](/teams/brera-tchumene)

On March 20, 2023 the Company announced the establishment of a newly branded football club in Mozambique named Brera Tchumene, a team admitted to the Second Division Championship in Mozambique, an east African country of nearly 32 million people. 

[![uyba logo](https://storage.googleapis.com/vendorgroup-assets/site/246abe1c-dd4c-49cb-a2ed-056c6b3bf6e2/uyba-logo.png/2023/09/12/6500cf92e230223623b57df9)](/teams/uyba)

On July 5th, 2023 Brera announced the acquisition of a majority ownership stake in the Italian Serie A1 women’s professional volleyball team UYBA Volley S.s.d.a.r.l., based in Busto Arsizio, north of Milan (“UYBA” or “UYBA Volley”). The team currently plays in the Serie A1, Italy's highest professional league. 

[![Ilch Logo](https://storage.googleapis.com/vendorgroup-assets/site/246abe1c-dd4c-49cb-a2ed-056c6b3bf6e2/Brera-Ilch-logo.webp/2024/03/15/65f471d43906513d898952f9) ](/teams/ilch)

[](/teams/ilch) In September 2023, the Company assumed control of Bayanzurkh Sporting Ilch FC, a team in the Mongolian National Premier League, which became Brera Ilch FC when the football season resumed in March 2024. 

### Fenix Trophy - Tournament 2024-25

**Last Round**

October 9, 2024 LUDO COECKSTADION – ANTWERP (BELGIUM) K. Berchem Sport **7 - 2** Llantwit Major FC 

October 15, 2024 BROADHURST PARK – MANCHESTER (ENGLAND) FC United of Manchester **5 – 0** Prague Raptors FC 

October 16, 2024 FSCG FOOTBALL GROUND – PODGORICA (MONTENEGRO) FC Fans United **5 – 0** Brera FC 

October 19, 2024 ZELEZNIK STADIUM – BELGRADE (SERBIA) FK Miljakovac **4 – 1** KP Bor 

**Next Round**

November 13, 2024 SDM GLASS STADIUM – BRIDGEND (WALES) Llantwit Major FC – K. Berchem Sport 

November 25, 2024 EDEN ARENA – PRAGUE (CZECH REPUBLIC) Prague Raptors FC – FC United of Manchester 

**Matchups**

![Fenix Trophy Bracket](https://storage.googleapis.com/vendorgroup-assets/site/246abe1c-dd4c-49cb-a2ed-056c6b3bf6e2/fenix-trophy-bracket.png/2024/10/11/67094ecedfe7c476d19393e5)

### Follow Us

  * [](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1I_p5pk4iLfVejPytcnk8w)
  * [](https://www.facebook.com/BreraCalcio)
  * [](https://www.instagram.com/brerafc/)
